title: Porcini nut patties
description: Nut roast doesn't have to be dry, leaden or worthy. These little patties have juicy, rich mushrooms and tasty macadamia nuts.This meal, when served as 15 portions, provides 267kcal, 6g protein, 18g carbohydrates (of which 5g sugars), 18g fat (of which 1.5g saturates), 3.5g fibre and 0.4g salt per portion.
ingredients: 300ml/10½fl oz hot water from the kettle
2 tbsp groundnut oil, plus extra for greasing
